InstalledItem.Name: MSD-423 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 4
Missiles: 2xS3

Behring’s MSD-423 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 4 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of two S3 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Arrester III Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Cross Section
Size: 3

Using cross section targeting to hunt for its prey, the Firestorm Arrester proximity missile makes quick work of enemies caught in the crosshairs.

InstalledItem.Name: FullStop
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Gorgon Defender Industries
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Military

Featuring proprietary recoil tech, the FullStop shield generator was built to better absorb attacks from a multitude of damage types.

InstalledItem.Name: UltraFlux
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Amon & Reese Co.
Size: 2
Grade: B
Class: Military

Initially designed under a military contract, A&R's UltraFlux medium power plant decimated the required performance milestones and enjoyed a storied career as a dependable military asset. When the military’s exclusive rights to this high quality component lapsed, A&R eagerly released this to the commercial market.

InstalledItem.Name: Boreal
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics
Size: 2
Grade: D
Class: Military

Designed to disperse the heat of battle, Aegis Dynamics’ Boreal cooler is a military standard with the capacity to survive stressful situations.
